nodes.text: Chommell Minor was a planet near Naboo.

Chommell Minor was the namesake of the Chommell sector. It was also the homeworld of Janus Greejatus, who would serve for a short time as the sector's representative after Palpatine's election as Supreme Chancellor and, following the Clone Wars, become a member of the Imperial Inner Circle. In 22 BBY, shortly before the outbreak of the Clone Wars, Senator Padmé Amidala campaigned on the planet against the Military Creation Act.
Some sources use an alternate spelling of Chommel. Leland Chee has stated that Chommell is the correct spelling.
